articles.author: Sheikh Saaliq
articles.title: Vance arrives in India for a 4-day visit that includes talks with Modi - AP News
articles.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance has arrived in India for a four-day visit as New Delhi looks to avoid U.S. tariffs and negotiate a bilateral trade deal with Washington. Vance will meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi on the first day of his largely personal visit. …
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) U.S. Vice President JD Vance arrived in India on Monday for a four-day visit as New Delhi looks to avoid U.S. tariffs, negotiate a bilateral trade deal with Washington and strengthen t… [+5167 chars]
